thread.title: Mammootty to leave for the UK in November
thread.title_full: Mammootty to leave for the UK in November - The Times of India

author: Sanjith Sidhardhan
title: Mammootty to leave for the UK in November
text:
Mammootty is all set to leave for the UK for the shoot of his next film White, which has Huma Qureshi playing the female lead.
The actor, who got back from Japan last week after a family tour, is currently dubbing for AK Sajan's yet-to-be-titled film and will head out to Chennai soon to finish canning a song along with its female lead Nayantara.
White is directed by Uday Ananthan and has Mammootty playing a billionaire who falls in love with a 25-year-old girl essayed by Huma.
